programme.desc: Master sculptor and gilder Adam Williamson shows Kirstie Allsopp how easy it is to apply gold leaf to a second-hand picture frame, giving it that luxury look.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Recently divorced Rajula plans to buy a place in southern Spain to enjoy with her twin sons and friends. Sara Damergi shows her what's on the market near the pretty coastal town of Nerja.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi takes Viv and Steve house-hunting on Spain's northern Costa Blanca. With a budget of Â£130,000, they are looking for a holiday home that they can eventually retire to.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Max McMurdo travel the length of Britain looking for items to fix up and flog. In Wales, picks include an oil dispenser, a chaise longue and a catamaran. (S2 Ep5/25)

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien find, fix and flog unwanted possessions. This episode includes an old cheese press. And a 1980s motorbike almost gets the better of Henry and Guy. (S2 Ep11/25)

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Tim and Rebecca struggle to get their kilometre-long driveway ready for high-end sports cars. Amy and Marc unearth a medieval fireplace. Dick checks in with Ben and Billie. (S3 Ep3)
This time Four in a Bed becomes Four in a Camp Bed, as four sets of campsite proprietors battle it out. The first visit is to Amber's Bell Tent Camping in north Norfolk.
programme.title: Four in a Bed
Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to Park Farm Camping and Caravan Site in Norfolk where husband-and-wife team Derek and Julie Nice want their back-to-basics, family-friendly glamping site to win.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the competition is to 500-year-old Layer Marney Tower, in Essex, where posh hosts Nick and Sheila Charrington unzip their luxury canvas lodges for scrutiny.
The fourth day of the competition is at the Foxhunter Park in Kent, where gregarious brother-and-sister team Jane Stacey and Russell Saunders own a luxury caravanning site.
programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.desc: Four in a Bed became Four in a Camp Bed for this competition, which saw campsite proprietors battle to be named best value. It's the last day and a few scores need settling.
programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.desc: A couple of expats swap Chelmsford for Charente, Spain's newest seafood restaurant begins to make a name for itself, and some Londoners host a traditional tea party at their French B&B.
programme.title: A New Life in the Sun

programme.desc: In North Yorkshire, Tim and Fuzz restore Helen's 1974 Mk1 Ford Capri, which is in so many pieces it's almost impossible to tell what it is. (S6 Ep10/10)

programme.desc: Rebecca visits Angel for tips on renovating the kitchen. Amy and Marc transform a bathroom that's stuck in a 1970s time-warp. Ben and Billie prepare for Billie's brother's wedding. (S3 Ep4)

programme.desc: Fred and Saffron build a home in the Peak District on a 30 degree slope, with the top floor in plain sight and two post-industrial style floors buried into the thick limestone below. (Ep7)

programme.desc: Brand new series: Charlie's in Derbyshire with Sean and Jill who aim to build a traditional home with a contemporary twist. But can their ambitious plans withstand the challenges? (S9 Ep4)
